providers.newProviderDescription: Add a new provider to Klee.
providers.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?
providers.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the provider and all associated data.

models.newModelDescription: Add a new model to Klee.

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for anyone with your personal work or study.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: If you want to use Klee with cloud models.

account.title: Account
account.expiration: Your subscription will be expired at {{endDate}}.
account.proUser: You are a pro user, next billing date: {{endDate}}.
account.resumeSubscriptionDescription: Your account will be charged for the next billing cycle on {{endDate}}.
account.cancelSubscriptionDescription: You will have access to all premium features until the end of your current billing period.

upgrade.title: Upgrade your plan
upgrade.description: Upgrade your plan to access cloud models like OpenAI.

themeSetting.description: Welcome to Klee, build your second brain with AI.

knowledge.newKnowledgeDescription: Import files and create new knowledge base
knowledge.newKnowledgeDescription2: Original files can be deleted after embedding.
knowledge.newKnowledgeDescription3: Embedded files can be deleted within Klee.
knowledge.newKnowledgeFolderDescription1: Existing folder will be linked and embedded.
knowledge.name: Name
knowledge.namePlaceholder: Type your knowledge base name here.
knowledge.descriptionPlaceholder: Type your knowledge base description here.
knowledge.caption: Files will be embedded locally, no data will be sent to the cloud.
knowledge.folderRefreshDescription: All files in the folder will be re-embedded
knowledge.folderLinkSuccess: Knowledge base linked to folder successfully
knowledge.folderLinkDescription: All files in the folder will be embedded

chat.placeholder: What do you want to know today...
chat.failedToRespond: Failed to respond. Please try again.
chat.failedToRespondReason: Failed to respond. Please try again. Error message: {{message}}

inspector.localModeDescription: Locally run all models on your device and no data will be sent to the cloud.
inspector.cloudModeDescription: Use advanced models from cloud providers, e.g. OpenAI, Anthropic.
inspector.modelDescription: Choose the model to use for the conversation.
inspector.systemPromptPlaceholder: Example: You are my study partner. You will ask me relevant questions based on the materials attached. After I respond, please evaluate my answers for accuracy and provide feedback.
inspector.knowledgeBaseDescription: Toggle the knowledge base to include them in the conversation.
inspector.noteDescription: Toggle the notes to include them in the conversation.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.localModeDescription: For simple and privacy sensitive tasks.
onboarding.openSourceModels: Open source models, e.g. Llama, Qwen.
onboarding.cloudModeDescription: For complex and non-privacy sensitive tasks.
onboarding.dataSentToCloud: Data will be sent to the cloud model providers
onboarding.noNeedForGPU: No need for high performance hardware
onboarding.recommend: You can always switch mode afterwards based on your needs.
onboarding.recommendDescription: Actually we recommend you to use local mode for privacy sensitive tasks and cloud mode for more complex and not privacy sensitive tasks.
onboarding.aiNotesDescription: Auto summary of all your conversations with AI.
onboarding.knowledgeBaseDescription: Store all your knowledge in one place, RAG ensures out of context knowledge.
onboarding.scalabilityDescription: PDF, Word, MD, Epub, Text, PPT, Excel and folders can be imported into knowledge base.
onboarding.autoCompleteDescription: A note not only for taking, but also for output.
onboarding.intelligenceDescription: With cloud mode, you can use advanced models like Claude, ChatGPT, etc.
onboarding.privacyDescription: With local mode, all models run locally on your device, absolutely zero data collection.
onboarding.waitingDownload: New version found, preparing to download...

titleBar.localModeDescription: Locally run all models on your device and no data will be sent to the cloud.
titleBar.cloudModeDescription: Use advanced models from cloud providers, e.g. OpenAI, Anthropic.
titleBar.noModel: No model, please go to the guide page.
